title: Educational Strategies for Building Confidence to Enhance Critical Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information literacy skills and experience adapting to digital environments
context.additional_context: Emphasis on hands-on practice using simulation/VR tools in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment to enhance workplace information evaluation skills for job seekers

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the credibility of information sources with 80% accuracy within four weeks.
Learners can generate at least three critical questions about problem situations presented in a VR simulation.
Learners can write a self-assessment report on their information analysis process through peer feedback evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
